IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_max_inventory_id') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_max_inventory_id GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_max_inventory_id @item_id dbo.id_t OUT AS
SET NOCOUNT ON DECLARE @inven_id dbo.id_t DECLARE @quest_id dbo.id_t SELECT @inven_id = ISNULL(MAX(id), 0) FROM dbo.Inventories SELECT @quest_id = ISNULL(MAX(id), 0) FROM dbo.Quest_Inventories
IF @inven_id > @quest_id BEGIN SET @item_id = @inven_id END ELSE BEGIN SET @item_id = @quest_id END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
